concept.title: Record Header Attributes
concept.shortdesc: The Google Pub/Sub Subscriber origin includes user-defined message attributes in record header attributes when they are available. When the origin

conbody.p: Google Pub/Sub Subscriber originrecord header attributesrecord header attributesGoogle Pub/Sub Subscriber originA Google Pub/Sub message contains a payload and optional attributes that describe the payload content. If the Google Pub/Sub Subscriber origin consumes a message with optional attributes, the origin includes the message attributes in record header attributes.
